```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, warning = F, message = F)
library(tidyverse)

change_type <- c("Lead Facilitate Only" = "Lead Facilitator",
                 "Tech/Support Facilitate Only" = "Tech/Support Facilitator",
                 "Available for Either Role" = "facilitator available for either lead or support")

data <- read_rds(here("Data/new_data_return.rds")) %>%
  mutate(type = str_replace_all(type, change_type))

mypaste <- function(text){
  paste(gsub(pattern = "\n", replacement = "  \n", x = paste(text, collapse = "\n")))
}
```

`r glue::glue("{data$Name}")` has signed up for the following time`r if_else(length(data$call_times) > 1, glue::glue("s"), glue::glue(""))`: 

`r glue::glue("{data$call_times %>% as_vector() %>% mypaste()}")` 

as a `r glue::glue("{data$type}")` at `r glue::glue("{data$Site}")`.

`r if_else(!is.na(data$fac_comments[1]), glue::glue("They also left the following comments:\n {data$fac_comments}"), "")`
